headline: Albemarle Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Albemarle Corp. (NYSE: ALB) announced today that it declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.405 per share. The dividend, which has an annualized rate of $1.62, is payable January 2, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business as of December 12, 2025.

headline: KPS CAPITAL PARTNERS TO ACQUIRE CONTROLLING STAKE IN KETJEN FROM ALBEMARLE
summary: KPS Capital Partners, LP ("KPS") announced today that, through a newly formed affiliate, it has entered into a definitive agreement with Albemarle Corporation ("Albemarle") (NYSE: ALB) to acquire a controlling stake in Ketjen Corporation's refining catalyst solutions business (collectively, "Ketjen" or the "Company"). headline: Albemarle Announces Sale of a Controlling Stake in Ketjen to KPS Capital Partners
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE: ALB), a global leader in providing essential elements for mobility, energy, connectivity and health today announced it has entered into a definitive agreement to sell a controlling stake in Ketjen Corporation's refining catalyst solutions business (collectively, "Ketjen" or the "Company") to KPS Capital Partners, LP ("KPS").
